releaseNotes: USB search fix for MP4s, full resolution downloads from Companion, can create aliases
releaseNotesList: Added static marquees only option in settings (will skip video marquees)
Lookup cache auto-refreshes on uploads with manual refresh button
Added Favorites and slideshow feature (includes video marquees)
Added copy button to log
/list handler for third party integration
Fixed intermittent 'not connected' boot screen
Changed video icon indicator
Ability to delete user-added system/console names
Fixed wifi reconnect issue on some networks
Fixed intermittent sports scoreboard not configured message
USB formatting for a blank thumb drive fixed and works from mobile app too
Added bulk upload support from Custom Upload in Companion, takes around 10 minutes to process 2000+ marquees and shows a progress update
Fixed intermittent marquees showing up without images in Companion
Browse marquees in Pixelcade Companion is much faster now
Added variations filter in Companion so by default we don't show all the rom name variations, mainly for MAME
User added systems in Companion will show up in a different color and sorted at
Time zone can be set in seettings which is needed for log time stamps and clock widget
MP4 video will now upload to the right location in the mp4marquees folder
Device info in Companion shows total numbrer of marquees in system, intenral, and USB storage
USB marquees are now found immediately during boot even while cache is still scanning
Marquee info page in Companion shows more details including if from USB or internal storage
7.1.5: The uploader in Companion now shows the progress and activity for each file
7.1.5: Some users were geting WiFi connected but no Internet
7.1.5: Files uploaded to internal storage weren't getting picked up
7.1.5: Browse marquees sorting always alphabetical
7.1.6: Can now delete user added video marquees
7.1.6: New header logo so easier to tell different between Pixelcade Companion LCD and LED
7.2.0: Added app based WiFi setup with hotspot when no WiFi configured
7.2.0: Added WiFi password validation so we don't kill existing WiFi if wrong password entered
7.2.0: Adding option to forget WiFi connection which reverts to HotSpot setup mode
7.2.0: Favorites changed to playlist, you can add widgets now to the playlist, drag and drop order and control each item duration
7.2.0: Fixed new USB formatting issue when hot swapping a new USB drive without a reboot
7.2.0: Added clear button to log
7.2.0: If no connectivity, show the QR code for the mobile apps to setup WiFi on startup
7.2.0: Added eject button for safe USB eject
7.2.1: Added attract mode option to playlist that if on will prevent interruption during arcade scrolling and game launches
7.2.1: Added drag icons to playlist items
7.2.2: Added plumbing for arcade front end Attract Mode/screen saver integration
7.2.3: Added Youtube channel stats widget
7.2.3: Added Google Calendar widget
7.2.3: Added Google Task widge
7.2.3: Added AI marquee generation widget that generates an AI marquee from the last selected game
7.2.4: Added Spotify now playing widget with album art for music, podcasts, and audiobooks
7.2.4: Added Google Photos widget with ability to select photos
7.2.4: Playlist Drag Indicator - Visual drop indicator shows exactly where items will be placed when reordering the playlist
7.2.4: Widget Settings UX Redesign - Widget settings now open as full-screen pages instead of modals for better mobile experience
7.2.5: Widets were not stopping consistently when other widgets or arcade marquees are sent
7.2.5: Added Custom Mappings to LCD Companion which auto redirects to the local Pixelcade Companion UI
7.2.5: Spotify widget can now be added to your playlist
7.2.6: Added Last.fm widget which can also be added to your playlist
7.2.6: Note that the Spotify widget currently requires a manual whitelist, DM me on Pixelcade Discord to get added
7.2.6: Note that Last.fm does not require a whitelist but you do need a Last.fm account
7.2.7: Added last.fm stats widget that shows most played artists, albums, recent tracks, discoveries, or a calendar view
7.2.7: Add stats for DOFLinx in game events
7.2.8: Added share button for logs on mobile devices (requires version 2.5+ of the iOS and Android apps)
7.2.8: Custom artwork upload works now from the Pixelcade Android app (requires versions 2.5+ of the app)
7.2.8  Fixed bug with Playlist on dual Pixelcade LED and LCD setups where the LCD playlist was getting mutliple widget calls at the same time
7.3.0  Add text param to /arcade handler, will scroll the game title or alt text if the dot matrix display is connected
7.3.0  Added ?nomini (don’t send metadata to the pulse displays), ?clearmini (clear pulse dislays), and ?minilcdonly (show only on miniLCD only, not dot matrix or 7segment) options to /arcade handler
7.3.1  New Widgets: Plex Now Playing, Yahoo Fantasy, Daily Horoscope, Commute Traffic (using google maps data source), Netflix Top 10, World Clock
7.3.1  Added missing 1player and 2player marquees for LCD Only DOFLinx in game effects users
7.3.1  Fixed bug Google Photos widget not always loading photos
7.3.2  Google photos not always loading fix continued
7.3.2  Attract mode was not being interrupted correctly
7.3.2  Shuffle default option for news ticket and google photos so they don't always start from the same sources
7.3.2  Faster load time for news feed
7.3.2  Added widget that simply shows the marquee of the current/last selected game
7.3.3. Fixed crash when there is an invalid news feed, added buffer spacing for the first news scroll
7.3.3  Last game widget will display now when Attract mode is in no interrupt mode
7.3.7  Weather widget UI and load time improvements
7.3.8  Artwork update with 1,500+ new marquees
7.3.8  Added incremental artwork updates so only new or changed artwork is downloaded vs. the whole repo every time
7.3.8  Fixed bug where weather in Attract Mode wasn't using the settings
7.3.8  Fixed AI marquee widget
7.4.0  Added default attract mode playlist and widget usability improvements
7.4.1  Added ?nogif and ?novideo params to /arcade handler to prevent sending video marquees for that call
7.4.2 Added settings option to support BitLCD hardware using the external HDMI input
7.4.3 Added progress bar in the Pixelcade app and Companion during firmware updates
7.4.3 USB search fix for large number of files on USB (thousands)
7.4.3 Added video only filter on browse marquees
7.4.4 Added more clock types: Pac-Man, Space Invaders, Tetris, Pong, Retro CRT, Donkey Kong, Frogger, Arkanoid, Galaga, Street Fighter, Dig Dug, and Rectangle
7.4.4 Multiple clock types can now be added to Attract Mode
7.4.5 Minor clock face improvements and you can change the clock face from Attact Mode
7.4.6 Added additional resolutions in Companion settings including for 14.9 1280 x390 screens
7.4.7 Added &nocomma param to the score display, remove comma automatically if score is over 1,000,000
7.4.7 Added user defined Google API key for commmute traffic widget
7.4.8 score display comma fix
